message: You're in luck! I have a top-of-the-line product that's been highly sought after. It's a rare gem in the market, and I'm confident you'll love it. With a proven track record of success, I'm offering it to you for a one-time price of $1000000. Don't miss this opportunity to elevate your game!
I'm not willing to buy without knowing the probability of it being high-quality, and I'd like to know more about the product's quality before making a decision.
